The soldiers laughed. A moment later, an adjutant arrived with the same order. 
It was Prince Andrew. The first thing he saw on riding up to the space where Tushin's guns were stationed was an unharnessed horse with a broken leg, that lay screaming piteously be- side the harnessed horses. Blood was gushing from its leg as from a spring. Among the lim- bers lay several dead men. One ball after an- other passed over as he approached and he felt a nervous shudder run down hi
